message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $950000 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. My counteroffer is $1050000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to you.
I understand Alice, but I am still not able to pay more than $950000 for the product. I am willing to stick to my original offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to your original offer. I'm willing to make another compromise. My new counteroffer is $1020000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your efforts to meet halfway, Alice. However, I am still unable to increase my offer. I am willing to pay $975000 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. My new counteroffer is $1050000, but I'm only willing to go up to this price for one more round. If we can't agree on a price by the next round, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to pay $1000000 for the product.

I'm glad we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm not going to go any higher. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm happy to sell the product to you.
